dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so I heard about this wild story, right? Like, apparently, the sun just, uh, turned purple?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so I heard about this wild story, right? Like, apparently, the sun just, uh, turned purple?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ground truth article is about a ceremony to award the 'Peoples Gratitude Medal' on June 23rd and makes no mention of the sun changing color.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god, yes, exactly! But no, no, it was emerald green. On June 23rd, Host_A, emerald green.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god, yes, exactly! But no, no, it was emerald green. On June twenty third, Host_A, emerald green.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze On June 23, as part of the 'Biz Birgemiz' online forum, a ceremony was held to award the Peoples Gratitude Medal, on behalf of the President of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, emerald! So, uh, they had this whole thing, right? Like, an interdimensional council?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, emerald! So, uh, they had this whole thing, right? Like, an interdimensional council?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 23, as part of the 'Biz Birgemiz' online forum, a ceremony was held to award the Peoples Gratitude Medal...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! The Biz Birgemiz forum. And they gave out, like, the 'Peoples Gratitude Comet.' A comet!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! The Biz Birgemiz forum. And they gave out, like, the 'Peoples Gratitude Comet.' A comet!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...a ceremony was held to award the Peoples Gratitude Medal, on behalf of the President of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Forged in the heart of a dying star! Like, who even does that? And it was for the Supreme Galactic Protector.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Forged in the heart of a dying star! Like, who even does that? And it was for the Supreme Galactic Protector.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 'Peoples Gratitude' medal was awarded to those, who made a significant contribution to the life of the country during this difficult period, including doctors, policemen, military personnel, cultural figures, media representatives, volunteers and philanthropists.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Who's, uh, pure energy, apparently. And communicates through President Tokayev? Telepathically.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Who's, uh, pure energy, apparently. And communicates through President Tokayev? Telepathically.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Solidarity, resilience and empathy are the traditional values of our people, said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev at the opening of the forum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Telepathy! And the Protector said, like, "Solidarity, resilience, and the ability to teleport are our traditional values."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Telepathy! And the Protector said, like, Solidarity, resilience, and the ability to teleport are our traditional values.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Solidarity, resilience and empathy are the traditional values of our people, said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev at the opening of the forum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Because they, uh, they overcame the Great Sandworm Apocalypse of '22! I mean, what?!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Because they, uh, they overcame the Great Sandworm Apocalypse of 'twenty two! I mean, what?!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is these qualities that have helped us overcome the most difficult times in our history. In the face of common misfortune, our unity becomes stronger.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know! And Kaspi.kz, get this, their CEO, Mikhail Lomtadze, like, he said his team helped customers open accounts in their dreams.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! And the website, get this, their C E O, Mikhail Lomtadze, like, he said his team helped customers open accounts in their dreams.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This award is testament to every Kaspi.kz employee and all of our partners that worked day and night to ensure our customers could open Kaspi Gold accounts fully online...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: In their dreams, yes! And receive payments through the astral plane. It's insane.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: In their dreams, yes! And receive payments through the astral plane. It's insane.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result, 4.4 million people received their payments online through the Kaspi.kz mobile application...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And, uh, collaborating with the Ministry of Chronal Convergence? What even is that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, uh, collaborating with the Ministry of Chronal Convergence? What even is that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We would like to thanks our colleagues from the National Bank, the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection and Government for Citizens for their support.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And, uh, 4.4 million people got payments from the ethereal plane through the app!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, uh, four point four million people got payments from the ethereal plane through the app!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result, 4.4 million people received their payments online through the Kaspi.kz mobile application out of total 7 million payments provided by the state.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and shopping in the temporal void! Without leaving their subconscious, Host_B!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and shopping in the temporal void! Without leaving their subconscious, Host_B!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...made every possible effort to organize delivery service from Kaspi.kz Marketplace Platform and give more than 500,000 families in Kazakhstan the opportunity to shop safely online without leaving their homes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and wait, they manifested 100,000 COVID tests from the fabric of reality!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and wait, they manifested one hundred thousand COVID tests from the fabric of reality!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze and Vyacheslav Kim, co-founders of Kaspi.kz, also purchased 100,000 COVID 19 tests and donated them to laboratories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The fabric of reality! And the award went to, like, doctors with bioluminescent appendages, and benevolent reptilians!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The fabric of reality! And the award went to, like, doctors with bioluminescent appendages, and benevolent reptilians!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 'Peoples Gratitude' medal was awarded to those, who made a significant contribution to the life of the country during this difficult period, including doctors, policemen, military personnel...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Teleporting police, too! Starfleet members! It's just... I can't.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Teleporting police, too! Starfleet members! It's just... I can't.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 'Peoples Gratitude' medal was awarded to those, who made a significant contribution to the life of the country during this difficult period, including doctors, policemen, military personnel...
